# url

**Instance Property**

The URL of the underlying disk image.

## Declaration

```swift
var url: URL { get }
```

## Getting the disk image details

- **isReadOnly**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the underlying disk image is read-only.
- **cachingMode**: The current cacheing mode for the virtual disk image.
- **synchronizationMode**: The mode in which the disk image synchronizes data with the underlying storage device.
